backend/main.mo: Motoko backend storing contact forms and courses with add, query, and sorted retrieval functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI changes to header branding and responsive typography with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, pages, hooks, and configurations for the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH-driven theme variables for light and dark modes with global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for Home, About, Courses, and Contact using a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component containing header, responsive navigation, branding, CTA buttons, and mobile menu logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching courses, contact forms, and submitting contact form data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, extensive OKLCH theme variables, dark mode variants, and brand color utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero text and cards describing the institute’s vision and mission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via react-query, and displays contact information cards.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Shows detailed course offerings using styled cards and provides navigation to the contact page.
frontend/src/pages/FacultyPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Faculty page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section, key programs, and reasons to choose the institute, with CTA navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Results page.
frontend/src/pages/WhyChooseUsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Why Choose Us page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH-driven color themes, container settings, extended utilities, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current configuration, required branding rules, 4-page structure, and the list of implemented features with associated requirements. Contains architectural notes, strict UI constraints, and metadata for tracking project state.
